###### IODS - Introduction to Open Data Science - 2017

# Week 5:
## Dimensionality reduction techniques

```{r}
human <- read.table("http://s3.amazonaws.com/assets.datacamp.com/production/course_2218/datasets/human2.txt", header=TRUE, sep=",")
str(human)
dim(human)
library(GGally); library(corrplot)
ggpairs(human)
summary(human)
corrplot(cor(human))
human_std <- scale(human)
summary(human_std)
pca_human <- prcomp(human)
biplot(pca_human, choices=1:2)
pca_human_std <- prcomp(human_std)
biplot(pca_human_std, choices=1:2)
names(human)
names(pca_human)
names(human_std)
names(pca_human_std)
```

```{r}
library()
data("tea")
```
